019    package com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.impl;
020    
021    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.BasicKey;
022    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.CacheEventRegistrar;
023    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.CacheKeyPrefixStrategy;
024    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.ChangeEvent;
025    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.Lock;
026    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.Mutex;
027    import com.smartitengineering.domain.PersistentDTO;
028    
029    /**
030     *
031     * @author imyousuf
032     */
033    public final class CacheAPIFactory {
034        
035        private static CacheEventRegistrar registrar;
036    
037        private CacheAPIFactory() {
038            throw new AssertionError();
039        }
040    
041        public static <KeyType> Lock<KeyType> getLock(int attaibnedPermissions,
042                                                      KeyType key) {
043            LockImpl<KeyType> lockImpl = new LockImpl<KeyType>();
044            lockImpl.setLockKey(key);
045            lockImpl.setAttainedPermissions(attaibnedPermissions);
046            return lockImpl;
047        }
048    
049        public static <LockKeyType> Mutex<LockKeyType> getMutex() {
050            return new MutexImpl<LockKeyType>();
051        }
052    
053        public static <K> BasicKey<K> getBasicKey(String prefix,
054                                                  String prefixSeparator) {
055            BasicKey<K> basicKeyImpl = new BasicKeyImpl<K>();
056            basicKeyImpl.init(getSimpleCacheKeyPrefixStrategy(prefix,
057                prefixSeparator));
058            return basicKeyImpl;
059        }
060    
061        public static CacheKeyPrefixStrategy getSimpleCacheKeyPrefixStrategy(
062            String prefix,
063            String prefixSeparator) {
064            if (prefix == null) {
065                throw new IllegalArgumentException();
066            }
067            SimpleCacheKeyPrefixStrategyImpl prefixStrategyImpl =
068                new SimpleCacheKeyPrefixStrategyImpl();
069            prefixStrategyImpl.setPrefix(prefix);
070            prefixStrategyImpl.setPreferredPrefixIdSeparator(prefixSeparator != null
071                ? prefixSeparator : ":");
072            return prefixStrategyImpl;
073        }
074    
075        public static <P extends PersistentDTO> ChangeEvent getChangeEvent(P source,
076                                                                           ChangeEvent.ChangeType changeType) {
077            if(source == null || changeType == null) {
078                throw new IllegalArgumentException();
079            }
080            ChangeEventImpl eventImpl = new ChangeEventImpl();
081            eventImpl.setChangeType(changeType);
082            eventImpl.setSource(source);
083            return eventImpl;
084        }
085    
086        public static CacheEventRegistrar getCacheEventRegistrar() {
087            if(registrar == null) {
088                registrar = new CacheEventRegistrarImpl();
089            }
090            return registrar;
091        }
092    }
